import React, { useState } from 'react' function Cadastrar() { const [meta, setMeta] = useState({ name: '', description: '', status: '', }) const onChangeInput = event => setMeta({...meta, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) const sendMeta = async event => { event.preventDefault() const res = await fetch('http://localhost') } return ( <>

Cadastrar Minha Meta




) } export default Cadastrar
